name: Neon Rush (Halberd63)
description:
Neon Rush is a submission to the Community Game Jam of 2019, prompt: "The game is a Liar"

It is a colourful little bullet-hell and that is 100% all there is to it. No lies here, we promise you ;)

Has controller support but it's a little janky... Keyboard and mouse combo is preferable.

This is a first jam for most of us and we really enjoyed ourselves! Thank you so much to the hosts!!

PS: To see everything the game has to offer, you need to think outside the box ;)

Thanks so much!! <3

Contributors:

  • Jay Wingate (Programmer), "ShasO"
  • Halen Boyd (Programmer), "Halberd"
  • Tarsha Schaller (3D Artist)
  • Dylan Lynton (Composer)
